text:
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
March 10, 1955
Mr, Robert VanDuyn
Associate Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Bob:
Do you plan to be in Columbus for the Institute
anytime? The dates are April 12 - 15, The NAEB
Board will be meeting Tuesday, April 12, and we'd
be happy to have you with us in case it's convenient.
Sincerely,
FES: fish
Frank E. Schooley
President
